disclaimer.description_html: By signing up via SMS, you agree to receive automated marketing messages, including cart reminders, at the phone number provided. Consent is not a condition of purchase. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for help. Frequency of messages varies. Message and data charges may apply. Check out our %{privacy_policy_link} and our %{terms_of_service_link}.
disclaimer.description_html_transactional: We'll send you an order confirmation and recurring shipping updates via SMS. Reply with STOP to unsubscribe. Reply with HELP for help. Frequency of messages varies. Message and data charges may apply. View our privacy policy and terms of service.

cart.stock_problems_html: One or more articles are no longer available. We have a updated shopping cart prepared.
cart.items_changed: One or more articles have been changed.
cart.product_sold_out: The product '%{name}' is already sold out.
cart.variant_requires_selling_plan: Variant can only be purchased with a sales subscription.
cart.shipping_address_not_required: No shipping is required with this shopping cart
cart.shipping_address_invalid: There was a problem calculating your shipping costs. Proceed to checkout to choose shipping costs before completing your order.
cart.selling_plan_not_applicable: Unable to apply sales subscription to variant

tags.add_articles: Limit the search to articles with the tag %{tag}
tags.add_products: Limit the search to products with the matching tag %{tag}
tags.remove_articles: Extend the search to articles not tagged with %{tag}

challenge.message: Let us know you are not a robot to continue.
challenge.error: Your answer was wrong, please try again.

subscribed.confirmation: Thank you for subscribing to our mailing list.
subscribed.disclaimer: You can unsubscribe at any time.

unsubscribed.confirmation: You have been unsubscribed from our mailing list.
unsubscribed.disclaimer: You will no longer receive marketing updates from us. You can re-register at any time.
unsubscribed.preview: You're previewing what customers will see when they unsubscribe.

opt_in.opted_in_html: You have consented to email open tracking.
opt_in.visibility: Email open rates are reported anonymously. We'll only see if you've opened an email as part of an aggregated email open rate.
opt_in.opt_out_html: you can sign out from email open-tracking if you don't want to share this information.
opt_in.preview_bar: You're previewing what customers will see when they consent to receive open tracking emails.

opt_out.opted_out_html: You have opted out of email open tracking.
opt_out.visibility: We don't see if you've opened our emails.
opt_out.opt_in_html: Authorize for open tracking of emails.
opt_out.preview_bar: You're previewing what customers will see when they opt out of receiving open tracking emails.

no_longer_track.status_html: We no longer track whether emails are opened.
no_longer_track.privacy_policy: After this email was sent, we updated our privacy policy and no longer track email opening.

track.visibility: We'll only see if you've opened the email, as part of the overall email open rate.

updated_policy.visibility: We've updated our policy and are now tracking open emails. Email open rates are reported anonymously. We'll only see if you've opened an email as part of the overall email open rate.
updated_policy.opt_out_html: If you no longer wish to share this information, you can sign out.

pick_up_time.five_or_more_days: Usually ready in more than 5 days
pick_up_time.next_day: Ready for pick up the next day
